channel.title: Help on server Start-up!
channel.description:
I compiled some new NPCS into the autospawn.cfg and ran runserver.bat. I got this , and when i tried to log in it game me this on the bat file and soon froze my client.
BlindScape initializing... Loading NPC's... Loading Objects... Loading Mapdata... BlindScape initialized!
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19687 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:2204) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1970) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:551) at server.main(server.java:111) Connection from 127.0.0.1:51657 [client-1-Dante]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 5 ms] Connection from 127.0.0.1:51658 [client-2-Dante]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 60 ms] Connection from 127.0.0.1:51659 [client-3-Dante]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 2 ms]
Help would be appreciated

item.title: Help on server Start-up!
item.dc:creator: @Dante112 Dante112
item.description:
@Dante112 wrote:

oh thanks for the help. ill just choose some npcs that arent in higher versions of the game/

Read full topic

item.title: Help on server Start-up!
item.dc:creator: @Im_Key Im Key
item.description:
@Im_Key wrote:

Umm i usually get something like this when running an old client on 474+ servers? With like newer NPC’s.

It’s probably because of the id’s you’ve added. Perhaps client doesn’t support them?

Read full topic
